name: Swap Drop and Roll
description:
A short platformer with a twist.

Start levels with one of 6 characters but a roll of the dice can change that.

Play with 6 characters, each with unique abilities/traits.

Play in one of two modes and try and get the highest score or lowest time.

Scores to beat included in about section. Let us know your best in the comments.

How to play section to teach you what you need to know and settings to turn sound off (but not back on)(this ain't no triple A production). Scores don't carry over if you close and reopen the game - sorry.

We have scanned the files to be safe and tested them to be stable.
